name: Not On My Watch
description:
In Not on my watch you must try to save the humanity from their own foolishness by destroying the nuclear missiles with your laser.

Requirements

For best results a graphic card with shader model 5 support is required.

Keyboard

Movement:  W A S D, Arrows

Shoot: Left click, Space, F

Exit: Esc

Controller (Xbox controller)

Movement: Joystick, D-pad

Shoot: Left Trigger, A button

Credits 

- Diego Vázquez Pérez

- Javier Rey Neira
